text: Morozov may refer to: *Morozov (crater), a lunar crater *Morozov (surname), people with the surname Morozov ==See also== *Kharkiv Morozov Machine Building Design Bureau (KMDB), a Ukrainian state-owned tank design bureau *Pavlik Morozov (1918–1932), play by Ukrainian writer Les Podervyansky *Morozovsky (disambiguation)
title: Morozov
